name: The Cinema VR
description:
Ever wanted to do it in a movie theater?
The Cinema VR offers an erotic Virtual Reality experience with realistic animations and carefully crafted lighting and sound effects to create maximum immersion.
Sit back, relax and enjoy the ride. Use your controller to change positions when you want.
Features
Supports all headsets, requires one controller
Voice acting
Fully Animated
Controls to reset camera orientationControls to replay scenes
